import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Modal, Icon, Header } from 'semantic-ui-react' const DeleteModal = ({ open, handleAction }) => { const inlineStyle = { modal : { marginTop: '0px !important', marginLeft: 'auto', marginRight: 'auto' } } return (
handleAction(false)} onOpen={() => handleAction(true)} open={open} size='small' dimmer={dimmer} style={inlineStyle.modal}> >
Archive Old Messages

Your inbox is getting full, would you like us to enable automatic archiving of old messages?

) } export default DeleteModal
